name: Space Binman
description:
Small game jam game made for the Godot Wild Jam with the following theme : Moon

This game was made by Simon Colin & myself in a few days (2 and a half days during the weekend + some tweaks on the next days). We know the gameplay isn't the best but we wanted to create a cool atmosphere first of all and to level up a bit on some tools before we work on a big project and we think we succeeded on both.

Here's the main tools we used :

  • Godot
  • Blender
  • Audacity
  • Asset Forge

Here are the assets we used :

  • Night_time by migfus20
  • Asset Forge by Kenney
  • Low Poly Satellite model by tathya
  • Flame Icon
  • Low Poly Practice pack from Itizso
  • Extinguisher sound effect
  • Footsteps sounds from OwlStorm
  • Car Passage sound from Big Sound Bank
  • Explosion sound from MagnusWaker
